product_description: TRESemme Pro Collection Keratin Smooth Shampoo 700 mL In life, sometimes you've got to take the rough with the smooth. But with hair, you really shouldn't have to. This is an essential first step for a fabulously smooth style that moves with you. How to get silky smooth hair: Beautifully smooth hair starts with gentle cleansing. Apply a generous dose of TRESemmé Keratin Shampoo to wet hair. Gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather. Once you've worked up a good lather, rinse well and follow up with the Keratin Smooth Conditioner to fight frizz and smooth every strand. Then prep hair for styling with the Keratin Smooth Heat Protect Spray and finish with the Keratin Smooth Shine Oil to give your look professional-quality polish. product_description:
Oriental Botanics Bhringraj & Amla Hair Shampoo is a gentle hair cleanser, rich in essential herbs and extracts that help remove dirt and impurities from the hair. It helps control hair thinning, breakage and promotes regrowth. It is a mild Shampoo that cleanses the scalp and hair while replenishing the natural oils. It is infused with Bhringraj, which has been long known in Ayurveda for its ability to improve hair growth and reduce hair fall. The richness of Aloe Vera helps to control dandruff and stimulate the growth of new hair. The natural extracts and oils present in the Shampoo help control hair fall and repair damaged hair, leaving you with healthy, strong, and voluminous hair after every wash. The formulation is safe for colored and chemically treated hair; this Shampoo is free of harmful chemicals & toxins such as Silicones, Parabens, Mineral Oil, & SLS/SLES.


Enriched With Bhringraj & Amla:

Bhringraj is one of nature’s best gifts used for improving hair health. It enhances blood circulation, promotes hair growth, prevents hair fall and dry scalp. It is deeply moisturizing & works as a natural conditioner for your tresses. A powerhouse of Vitamin C & antioxidants, Amla strengthens hair from the roots, prevents grey hair, softens hair strands, & improves scalp health. It also enhances hair growth.


Infused With Natural Oils:

Oriental Botanics Bhringraj & Amla Hair Shampoo contains the rich oils of Moroccan Argan, Amla, Bhringraj, & Ginger that nourishes the scalp to control hair thinning and breakage while stimulating hair growth.


Formulated With Natural Extracts:

The Shampoo is enriched with the natural extracts of Aloe Vera, Bamboo, Curry, Fenugreek, Hibiscus, Neem, & Shikakai that helps to effectively cleanse the scalp and hair, without stripping the natural oils.

product_description: Bioteez-S Anti Dandruff Shampoo is a non-drying anti dandruff shampoo designed for dandruff and flaky scalp conditions. It also helps to treat seborrheic dermatitis. The shampoo also comes with the goodness of tea tree oil to soothe the itchy and irritated scalp. it contains the anti-dandruff agents which maintain static electricity in hair, provides the conditioning effect, relieves in itchy & dry scalp. Loosens and removes the dead cells forming the flakes. Provides deep conditioning effect on scalp & hair. Relieves dandruff related dryness. Chitosan is there to protect hair from wavy hair and bleaching agents. It helps to retain moisture in low humidity and to maintain hair's style in high humidity. A clear solution that contains chitosan forms a clear, elastic film on hair, increasing its softness and mechanical strength. It reduces dandruff, reduces desquamation, regulates sebum production, Soothes, tones & cleans scalp. How to use: Wet hair with warm water and apply sufficient shampoo to create a rich lather. Gently massage into your scalp. Leave the shampoo on for at least 3 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For best results apply three times a week in active dandruff followed by a single application every week.

product_description: Professional formula that rebuilds hair structure for smoother, shinier, manageable hair. Best suited for dry, damaged, frizzy, brittle, chemically treated hair. Contains Plant Keratin which is a vegetable-based alternative to hydrolyzed animal keratin normally found in other keratin shampoos. It consists of wheat, soy, & corn proteins which mimic the functional ratio of protein in human hair. Plant Keratin therefore gives better absorption and anchoring of proteins to damaged hair for stronger conditioning, improved flexibility and reduced hair breakage. Iba Plant Keratin Protein Shampoo Advantage: Rebuilds damaged hair structure by replenishing vital proteins • Creates a protective layer that prevents structural damage and smoothens cuticles to retain color and moisture • Reduces frizz, seals and repairs split-ends making hair more manageable • Effectively cleanses hair and scalp with high foaming sulfate-free formula • Paraben free, alcohol free, halal certified, PETA Certified Vegan & Cruelty-free product. THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT CONTAIN ANIMAL KERATIN MADE FROM ANIMAL HAIR, FEATHERS, HOOVES AND HORNS.

product_description:
Sebamed Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is a soap and harsh detergent free shampoo and has been formulated by Dermatologists to ensure gentle, deep - pore scalp cleansing to remove the excess sebum, which helps in the growth of dandruff causing bacteria. Sebamed Anti-Dandruff Shampoo contains a gentle cleanser which ensures effective cleansing action without irritation and the adjustment of the formulation to the physiological pH value of 5.5 same as that of healthy scalp to help in the formation of the protective scalp barrier formation. Regular use of Sebamed Anti Dandruff shampoo will prevent the dandruff from comming back.

The active ingredient, Piroctone Olamine relieves dandruff irritation and prevents the formation and proliferation of dandruff causing bacteria on the scalp. Sebamed Anti-Dandruff shampoo has been especially formulated with mild wash active substances to gently cleanse hair and scalp, dislodging the dandruff flakes. The active ingredient Piroctone Olamine counteracts dandruff causing micro-organisms soothing irritation. The effectiveness was confirmed clinically in the anti-dandruff test: 50% less dandruff after 14 days. Moisturising and conditioning ingredients revitalize the hair and improve its texture making hair silky and smooth. The pH value of 5.5 supports the regeneration of the scalp's acid mantle to stabilize its barrier function. The efficacious dandruff control properties of sebamed Anti-Dandruff Shampoo have been clinically tested.
 Sebamed Anti-Dandruff shampoo is free from irritants like Parabens / Paraffin / Propylene Glycol / Phthalates hence is well tolerated and safe for long term use.

product_description:
1. MAKES WATER SOFTER: This water softener contains chelating agents. As soon as you add this softener to the water, it reduces the hardness of the water by removing minerals like calcium and magnesium. Get soft water in no time!
2. BALANCE pH: Our scalp needs a pH of 4.5 and hard water has a pH greater than 8.5 - making it harsh for your scalp. Adding this water softener would balance the pH of your bathing water. This helps in maintaining scalp health.
3. IMPROVES PRODUCT EFFICACY: When using harder water, hair products like shampoo and conditioner cannot perform their function well. Bathing water with balanced pH keeps your hair healthy and allows your hair products to work better.
4. SAFE & EFFECTIVE CHELATING AGENT: Hard water contains a very high quantity of calcium and magnesium, which causes a buildup on the scalp. The buildup doesn't allow any hair product to reach the scalp optimally and deliver its benefits. This water softener works by balancing the pH of hard water and reducing the quantity of calcium and magnesium. Using soft, pH balanced water improves scalp and hair health!
5. HOW TO USE: Shake well before use. Add 25 ml of the Chelating Water Softener in a bucket full of water. Stir and wait to dissolve before using the water for washing your hair.
Note: Use only after diluting with water. Avoid direct contact with eyes and keep out of reach of children. For water that has very high hardness, please add an additional 20 ml of softner, and use a hardness testing strip to check whether hardness has reduced sufficiently.

product_description:
A bar of nourishment, for everyone! Rustic Art Amla Shikakai hair cleansing bar brings you the old school, tried and tested hair care routine of the Granny's! 
Amla is an all-rounder in the hair care routine. Fighting everything off, from dandruff to lice, Amla also strengthens the scalp and hair, whereas Shikakai and Ginger oil strengthens the hair follicles resulting in a perfect combo for perfect hair! A combination of Amla and Shikakai also fights off environmental stressors and keep your hair tangle free post wash. Methi and Mango butter add to the nourishment, moisturization and make your hair shine. Neroli balances the oil in the scalp and leaves behind a mild soothing fragrance. A traditional solution for your modern hair.

Rustic Art Hair Cleansing Bars are 100% soap free & biodegradable, vegan, free of sulphates, paraben and silicones. It is made using super critical extracts of the herbs. Super critical extracts have high concentration of plant nutrients, is absorbed quickly & provides deep nourishment. It is the next best thing to the freshly sourced herb. The surfactant blend is derived from plant based ingredients like coconut oil, olive oil & sugarcane. This blend is super mild with excellent sensory attributes. It is non-stripping, non-drying, and safe for chemically treated & coloured hair. The bar contains no synthetic colours or fragrances. It is pH balanced for hair wash. It can be used post oil massage. Suitable for all hair types. Water Efficient: Requires less water to rinse off, does not add toxins to rinsed off water. One hair cleansing bar replaces at least 3 shampoo bottles.
To Use: Rub wet palms against the hair cleansing bar to lather. Massage. Rinse. After use, store the bar upright in a dry place for longer lasting product. 
Good hair day, everyday!

product_description: Cocamidopropyl Betaine (CAPB) is a mixture of organic compounds derived from coconut oil. It is available as a viscous pale-yellow solution and is used as a medium-strength amphoteric surfactant in personal care products. It is highly water soluble in a wide pH range and produces a thick lather, making the products feel creamier. Lathering helps loosen the dirt and impurities making it easy to rinse them off. CAPB is mild, gentle and well-tolerated by the skin and is used in foaming products for people with sensitive skin. Since it is essentially a synthetic fatty acid made from coconuts, it exhibits moisturising properties.

product_description:
1) MAKES WATER SOFTER: This water softener contains chelating agents. As soon as you add this softener to the water, it reduces the hardness of the water by removing minerals like calcium and magnesium. Get soft water in no time!
2) BALANCES pH: Our scalp needs a pH of 4.5 and hard water has a pH greater than 8.5 - making it harsh for your scalp. Adding this water softener would balance the pH of your bathing water. This helps in maintaining scalp health.
3) IMPROVES PRODUCT EFFICACY: When using harder water, hair products like shampoo and conditioner cannot perform their function well. Bathing water with balanced pH keeps your hair healthy and allows your hair products to work better.
4) SAFE & EFFECTIVE CHELATING AGENT: Hard water contains a very high quantity of calcium and magnesium, which causes a buildup on the scalp. The buildup doesn't allow any hair product to reach the scalp optimally and deliver its benefits. This water softener works by balancing the pH of hard water and reducing the quantity of calcium and magnesium. Using soft, pH balanced water improves scalp and hair health!
5) HOW TO USE: Shake well before use. Add 25 ml of the Chelating Water Softener in a bucket full of water. Stir and wait to dissolve before using the water for washing your hair.
Note: Use only after diluting with water. Avoid direct contact with eyes and keep out of reach of children. For water that has very high hardness, please add an additional 20 ml of softner, and use a hardness testing strip to check whether hardness has reduced sufficiently.

product_description:
1] STRENGTHENS AND NOURISHES HAIR FROM ROOT TO TIP: Our dermatologically tested anti-hair fall shampoo is specially designed for strengthening men’s hair and promoting hair health. No more damaged or broken hair—your strands will transform to give strong, shiny, and smooth hair with regular use. Make this shampoo a part of your hair care routine to ensure healthy hair with improved texture and denser hair.
2] CLEANSES YOUR SCALP AND FOLLICLES TO REDUCE HAIR FALL: The first step to controlling hair loss is maintaining a healthy scalp. Our anti-hair fall shampoo cleans any dirt, dust and residue build-up on your scalp, a result of everyday exposure to pollution, making it hydrated and cleansed. The shampoo unblocks and stimulates blood circulation to your follicles for a moisturized, clean and healthier scalp. A nourished scalp resists hair breakage for shinier, and more resilient hair.
3] NUTRIENT-PACKED FORMULA OF BIOTIN, ARGAN OIL AND CAFFEINE: Reduces hair fall and maintain overall hair health with a nice soft sheen, our shampoo does it all. Biotin is a vitamin that stimulates hair nourishment, thickens your hair making it appear more lustrous. Caffeine blocks the DHT hormone, which is the major cause of hair loss in men. Argan oil is rich in vitamin E to strengthen, repair, hydrate and soften your hair to give a frizz-free look.
4] RENEWED CONFIDENCE FOR YOUR HAIR AND PHYSICAL APPEARANCE: Forget being conscious of scanty or dandruff-clad hair. Our hair fall rescue shampoo is a one-stop solution for all men and hair types, guaranteed to make you more confident of your hair and overall physical appearance. Simply apply it to wet hair, massage into the scalp and leave it on for 2-3 minutes before rinsing to give your scalp the complete nourishment it deserves, and reducing hair fall during the wash.
5] LICENSED SAFE TO USE, FREE OF PARABENS AND SULPHATES: Our FDA-licensed shampoo is sulphate, SLS and paraben-free and is rid of any preservatives or harmful chemicals commonly used in cosmetic and pharmaceutical shampoos. The mild shampoo is composed of pure and natural ingredients to provide a complete package of nourishment leading to control hair fall, promote hair revival, and maintain healthy lustrous hair.

Bhringraj Extract – Ayurvedic herbal extract proven to reduce hair fall, prevent hair loss, delay graying, promote hair growth and condition hair. Amla Extract – Ayurvedic herbal extract rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, keeps hair follicles and scalp healthy. Neem Extract – Ayurvedic herbal extract that stimulates scalp blood flow to boost nourishment intake by hair follicles, soothes inflammation, checks dandruff and fungal infections. Shikakai Extract – Ayurvedic herbal extract with gentle hair cleansing, detangling and anti-fungal qualities. Rosemary Extract - Boosts scalp blood flow, strengthens hair, reduces premature graying. Saw Palmetto Extract – Natural DHT blocking action that helps reduce hair fall. DHT is dihydrotstosterone – a hormone responsible for hair loss. A DHT blocker can help reverse hair loss. Niacin – Also known as vitamin B3, aids healthy hair growth. This shampoo’s twice as powerful formulation contains the very best of Ayurvedic Herbal Extracts – Bhringraj, Amla, Neem, Henna, Shikakai and Lemon – and Western Herbal Extracts– Biotin, Rosemary, Saw Palmetto and Niacin – for aneffective action that doesn’t just stop at blocking DHT and reducing hair fall. Being rich in key nutrients which are beneficial for hair care such as, lauric acid, vitamin e, phosphorus, iron, magnesium and copper, it strengthens the hair roots, repairs the hair shafts, promotes the production of color pigments and smoothens down the rough cuticles to ensure that your hair looks and feels much softer, much healthier. Nettle leaf and saw palmetto extracts are two natural and acclaimed blockers used by traditional healers in Europe and north America for centuries for hair loss and for stimulating hair growth. These two work together to boost blood supply to the hair roots, which helps reduce hair fall. And, they have been known to gradually transform the thinning hair into a thick and glossy mane.

Biotin is a vitamin that stimulates hair nourishment, thickens your hair making it appear more lustrous. Caffeine blocks the DHT hormone, which is the major cause of hair loss in men. Argan oil is rich in vitamin E to strengthen, repair, hydrate and soften your hair to give a frizz-free look.
5] RENEWED CONFIDENCE FOR YOUR HAIR AND PHYSICAL APPEARANCE: Forget being conscious of scanty or dandruff-clad hair. Our hair fall rescue shampoo is a one-stop solution for all men and hair types, guaranteed to make you more confident of your hair and overall physical appearance. 6] LICENSED SAFE TO USE, FREE OF PARABENS AND SULPHATES: Our FDA-licensed shampoo is sulphate, SLS and paraben-free and is rid of any preservatives or harmful chemicals commonly used in cosmetic and pharmaceutical shampoos. 1] Co-Created with Dermatologists: Man Matters Anti-dandruff shampoo is specially designed for men, together by a team of dermatologists specializing in Men Hair Health. Made with an effective antifungal agent clinically proven to curb dandruff and inflammation in the scalp, it fights flakes, itchiness, and fungal infections in the scalp known as Seborrheic dermatitis and also fights dandruff due to excess oil in the scalp.
2] 3X Faster Reduction in FLAKING, ITCHING & DRY SKIN: Regular shampoos use only 1-2% active ingredients. We also use clinically optimized Provitamin B5 and Aloe Vera for long-lasting flake & itch relief.
76% FEWER FLAKES WITH SOOTHING: Unlike shampoos that burn and cause irritation, we use powerful yet gentle botanical extracts and vitamins that are clinically proven to treat and prevent dandruff without unwanted effects on your hair and scalp. Dermatologically approved for all hair types and coloured hair. No damage, colour loss or irritation even with long-term use
3] HOW TO APPLY TO RENEW YOUR CONFIDENCE: Forget being conscious of dandruff-clad hair. Simply apply it to wet hair, massage it into the scalp, and leave it on for 2-3 minutes before rinsing to give your scalp the complete nourishment it deserves and reducing hair fall during the wash. The gentle ingredients do not dry out the hair and irritate the scalp. Use twice a week for best results.
4] LICENSED SAFE TO USE, FREE OF PARABENS AND SULPHATES: Our dermatologically tested shampoo is sulfate, and paraben-free and is rid of any preservatives or harmful chemicals commonly used in cosmetic and pharmaceutical shampoos. The mild yet effective shampoo is composed of pure and natural ingredients to provide a complete package of nourishment leading to dandruff control, improved scalp health conditions, and reduction in hair damage.
